<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/69552</entry>
  </identifier>

    <entry>69552</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120807</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Tanek film,  spremenljiva valovna dolžina svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">Thin film, variable wavelength of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dünnfilm, variable Wellenlänge des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La couche mince, longueur d'onde variable de 
lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Película fina, wavelength variável da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pellicola sottile, lunghezza d'onda variabile di 
luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεπτή ταινία, μεταβλητό μήκος κύματος του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Película fina, longitud de onda variable de la 
luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Odvisnost energije odbojnega vala pri odboju od meje med snovjo z različnim lomnim količnikom od valovne dolžine vala.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between the energy of reflected wave caused by reflection from medium with different refraction index and wavelength of the wave.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odbojni val</string>
            <string language="en">wave reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">interferenca</string>
            <string language="en">interference</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relation zwischen der Energie der reflektierten 
Welle verursacht durch Reflexion vom Medium mit unterschiedlichem 
Brechungindex und Wellenlänge der Welle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relation entre l'énergie de la vague reflétée 
provoquée par réflexion de support avec l'incrément différent de 
réfraction et la longueur d'onde de la vague.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação entre a energia da onda refletida 
causada pela reflexão do media com deslocamento predeterminado 
diferente do refraction e o wavelength da onda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto fra l'energia dell'onda riflessa causata
dalla riflessione dal media con l'indice differente di rifrazione e la
lunghezza d'onda dell'onda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέση μεταξύ της ενέργειας του απεικονισμένου κύματος
που προκαλείται από την αντανάκλαση από το μέσο με το 
διαφορετικό ευρετήριο διάθλασης και του μήκους κύματος του 
κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relación entre la energía de la onda reflejada 
causada por la reflexión del media con diverso índice de la 
refracción y la longitud de onda de la onda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion de vague</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interférence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão da onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interferência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione dell'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interferenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση κυμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέμβαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión de la onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interferencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
